name: Dino Survivors
description:
Dino Survivors is a game inspired by great hits of the roguelite genre, with a 'pixel art' artistic style and simple, automatic gameplay so you can start going out hunting prehistoric creatures without the need to learn complex systems!

Use primitive tools to survive and explore a prehistoric world!

Explore different scenarios and combinations of primitive tools, with several playable characters to try to reach the big boss in each area.


Play and Discover

Each Enemy has unique characteristics and different attack patterns that make the game very challenging. Discover dozens of different species of fantastic animals that once existed, as well as learning a little more about their characteristics and behaviors.


Secrets and Collectibles

Find all the Tools and secrets hidden in the game with the unlockable system, collections and dozens of achievements for those who like to explore.
